Text: Bregs, I love the movies you choose, but I ABSOLUTELY HATE your screens pages..... always no less than FOUR ads running at the SAME time, making for an unenjoyable experience!----PLEASE change your screens page to some host with less ad content!!!!
@bytor10464     Sure bro i will look for the way out or change the uploading pics site

Another - better - solution could be installing an adblocker. I never see any adds on bregos screen-pages, nor anyone else :-)

Brego, thanks for the many interesting uploads.
